Question: China Electronics Intl Exh & Adv Co., Ltd. Cecexpo CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
China Electronics Intl Exh & Adv Co., Ltd. (CECexpo)

CES 2024

- CECexpo is a professional exhibition organization specializing in organizing Chinese exhibitors for global exhibitions.
- Established in 1988 and transformed into a limited liability company in 2001.
- Main business involves exhibition, advertising, and design.
